titles.title: A bill to provide that surplus dairy products should be provided to carry out the temporary emergency food assistance program before certain dairy export programs to extend such dairy export programs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Livestock, Dairy, and Poultry.
Referred to Subcommittee on Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition.

committee.subcommittee: Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 5/4/1988--Introduced. Amends the Food Security Act of 1985 to extend through FY 1991: (1) the dairy export incentive program; and (2) the export sales of dairy products program. Amends the Temporary Emergency Food Assistance Act of 1983 to state that such dairy export programs shall not be operated in a way that will reduce dairy products available for the temporary emergency food assistance program.
